text: Bandum teuh tawoe ubak Droeuneuhnyan K Bit janji Tuhan beunar tan salah 3 Neupuphon peujeut dilee saboh roe Lheuhnyan Neupeuwoe mangat Neubalah Ureueng meuiman lom jipubuet got i Balasan meuhat ade bak Allah Teuma keu kaphe geubri ie tutong Azeub jitanggong peudeh sileupah Sabab jikaphe han jimeuiman
